LanguageData.DMS_ChunkSlag.label: automatroid debris
LanguageData.DMS_ChunkSlag.description: The remains of a destoryed automatroid. While useless in its current form, it can be smelted to recover resources.
LanguageData.DMS_ChunkSlag_Old.label: ancient automatroid debris
LanguageData.DMS_ChunkSlag_Old.description: The remains of a destoryed automatroid. While useless in its current form, it can be smelted to recover resources.
